document.title: A Room Full of Men (For Men Only)
document.abstract: This males-only presentation invites young men to openly and honestly discuss their attitudes and beliefs about their role in society. We will also discuss beliefs and attitudes about issues such as self-esteem, self-worth, love and commitment, depression, anger, the impact the black male image has on society and what it means to be a man as well as what it takes to be a leader in this day and time.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
